name: Freezer Pops Guide
description:
Freezer Pops Guide is a spoiler document with all choices you need to make to unlock all CGs as well as get ALL the endings. It's the easiest way for you to unlock the whole content of the game. Do you want to end the game with Anderson or Fernando as your boyfriend?!

This DLC contains a pdf document FULL OF SPOILERS about Freezer Pops.
